001package src.pkg_commands;
002import src.pkg_models.Player;
003import src.pkg_game.GameEngine;
004
005
006/**
007 * The HelpCommand class represents the command that the player can issue to get help or guidance.
008 * 
009 * @author Pierre MATAR
010 */
011public class HelpCommand extends Command
012{
013    /**
014     * Executes the "help" command. This method prints a brief description of the game
015     * and lists all the valid commands that the player can use.
016     *
017     * @param pPlayer The player object, representing the current player in the game.
018     * @param pGameEngine The game engine, which controls the game's state and logic.
019     */
020    @Override
021    public void  execute(final Player pPlayer, final GameEngine pGameEngine) {
022        pGameEngine.getGui().println("You are lost. You are alone.");
023        pGameEngine.getGui().println("You wander around at the university.\n");
024        pGameEngine.getGui().println("Your command words are:");
025        pGameEngine.getGui().println(pGameEngine.getParser().getCommands());
026    }
027}
